node.bodyHTML:
代码比较拙劣，先蹭一下暴力解
思路：先画一个小盒子，盒子内画半圆，然后旋转至指定角度画出弧
再拼借6个小盒子

<style>
    /* 整个盒子 */
    .box{
      width: calc(2 * var(--radius));
      height: calc(2 * var(--radius));
      position: relative;
    }
    /* 单个小盒子 */
    .father{
      width: var(--radius);
      height: var(--radius);
      overflow: hidden;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      transform-origin: right top;
    }
    .father:nth-child(2n) {
      color: yellow;
    }
    /* 弧 */
    .hu{
      width: calc(2 * var(--radius));
      height: var(--radius);
      border-radius: 0 0 var(--radius) var(--radius);
      background-color: currentColor;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      transform-origin: top;
      transform: rotate(120deg);
    }
    .rotate1{
      transform: rotate(-120deg);
    }
    .rotate2{
      transform: rotate(-60deg);
    }
    .rotate3{
      transform: rotate(60deg);
    }
    .rotate4{
      transform: rotate(120deg);
    }
    .rotate5{
      transform: rotate(180deg);
    }
  </style>

<div class="box" style="--radius: 100px">
  <div class="father rotate1">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father rotate2">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father rotate3">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father rotate4">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="father rotate5">
    <div class="hu"></div>
  </div>
</div>

谢邀，这题很简单啊，看我的：

#nuclear {
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,');
}

长得不像不怪我嗷，人svg就长这样：https://www.svgrepo.com/svg/193192/radiation-nuclear

分成上下两部分绘制，使用伪类元素以减少dom元素
用了画三角形的思路， 中间是个等边三角形满足夹角为60度的图案
用position + margin方式实现元素居中，父元素为body

<div class="nuclear-warn"></div>
<script>
  const {sqrt, pow} = Math;
  // 把等腰三角形分成两个直角三角形，计算垂直边长，作为:before,:after的高度
  const a = 200; // 等边三角形变长
  const b = a / 2;
  const c = sqrt(pow(a, 2) - pow(b, 2));
  console.log(c); // 约等于173
</script>
<style>
    /* 居中容器样式 */
    body {
        width: 100vw;
        height: 100vh;
        position: relative;
    }

    .nuclear-warn {
        width: 200px;
        height: 200px;
        /* 垂直水平居中 */
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        margin: auto;

        border-radius: 100px;
        overflow: hidden;
        font-size: 0;
    }

    .nuclear-warn::before,
    .nuclear-warn::after {
        content: "";
        display: block;
        height: 173px; /* 边长200px的等腰三角形高度*/
        box-sizing: border-box;
    }

    .nuclear-warn::before {
        margin-top: -73px;
        border-top: 173px solid yellow;
        border-left: 100px solid black;
        border-right: 100px solid black;
    }

    .nuclear-warn::after {
        border-left: 100px solid yellow;
        border-right: 100px solid yellow;
        border-bottom: 173px solid black;
    }
</style>

借助CSS3 conic-gradient锥形渐变,应该是最简单最直接的方法。

<div class="sign"></div>
<style>
  .sign {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    border-radius: 50px;

    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(30deg);  /* 1.相对父级元素垂直水平居中 2.调整起笔角度 */

    background: repeating-conic-gradient(
      black,
      black 60deg, /* 黑色转60度 */
      yellow 60deg, 
      yellow 120deg /* 黄色转60度 */
    );
  }
</style>

神奇的 conic-gradient 圆锥渐变-实现核辐射图

彩蛋：实现三角形再也不通过border的透明度了，也可以通过 conic-gradient

1、css3引入的3个特性

background: conic-gradient  // 圆锥渐变
background: linear-gradient // 线性渐变
background: radial-gradient // 光晕渐变

效果图分别如下，通过效果图我们能够看出实现核辐射图需要使用到圆锥渐变

如图的圆锥渐变关键代码如下:

{
    width: 200px;
    height: 200px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    // 这样出来的颜色之间没有隔离，是线性的
    background: conic-gradient(red, orange, yellow, green, teal, blue, purple);
}

我们要实现的效果图需要颜色之间的完全隔离，因此可以使用如下代码实现

background: conic-gradient(yellow 0, yellow 30deg, black 30deg, black 90deg,yellow 90deg, yellow 150deg, black 150deg, black 210deg,yellow 210deg, yellow 270deg, black 270deg, black 330deg, yellow 330deg, yellow 36deg)

2、彩蛋，如果通过 conic-geadient 实现三角形

 {
      width: 200px;
      height: 200px;
      position: absolute;
      left: 50%;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      background: conic-gradient(yellow 0deg, yellow 135deg, red 135deg, red 225deg, yellow 225deg, yellow 360deg)
}

进一步完善,通过transparent进行透明

 {
      width: 200px;
      height: 200px;
      position: absolute;
      left: 50%;
      top: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      background: conic-gradient(transparent 0deg, transparent 135deg, red 135deg, red 225deg, transparent 225deg, transparent 360deg)
  }

Using conic-gradient

<div class="radiation-warning"></div>
.radiation-warning {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  background: conic-gradient(
    yellow 0deg 60deg,
    black 60deg 120deg,
    yellow 120deg 180deg,
    black 180deg 240deg,
    yellow 240deg 300deg,
    black 300deg 360deg
  );
}

Using Canvas

let size = 100
let borderWidth = 6
let pad = size * 0.12
let insideRoundR = size * 0.12
let insideRoundPad = insideRoundR * 0.19
let r = size / 2
let insideR = r - pad
let canvas = document.createElement("canvas")
document.body.append(canvas)
canvas.width = size
canvas.height = size
let ctx = canvas.getContext("2d")
// draw border
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.lineWidth = 6
ctx.arc(r, r, r - borderWidth / 2, 0, Math.PI * 2)
ctx.strokeStyle = "black"
ctx.stroke()
// fill yellow
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.arc(r, r, r - borderWidth, 0, Math.PI * 2)
ctx.fillStyle = "yellow"
ctx.fill()
// draw tri
let Hx = r + insideR * Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
let Hy = r + insideR * Math.sin(Math.PI / 3)
let Ix = r
let Iy = r + insideR / Math.cos(Math.PI / 6)
let Gx = r - insideR * Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
let Gy = r + insideR * Math.sin(Math.PI / 3)
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(r, r)
ctx.lineTo(Hx, Hy)
ctx.arcTo(Ix, Iy, Gx, Gy, insideR)
ctx.fillStyle = "black"
ctx.fill()

Hx = r + insideR * Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
Hy = r - insideR * Math.sin(Math.PI / 3)
Ix = r + insideR
Iy = r - Math.tan(Math.PI / 6) * insideR
Gx = r + insideR
Gy = r
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(r, r)
ctx.lineTo(Hx, Hy)
ctx.arcTo(Ix, Iy, Gx, Gy, insideR)
ctx.fill()

Hx = r - insideR
Hy = r
Ix = r - insideR
Iy = r - Math.tan(Math.PI / 6) * insideR
Gx = r - insideR * Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
Gy = r - insideR * Math.sin(Math.PI / 3)
ctx.beginPath()
ctx.moveTo(r, r)
ctx.lineTo(Hx, Hy)
ctx.arcTo(Ix, Iy, Gx, Gy, insideR)
ctx.fill()

ctx.beginPath()
ctx.arc(r, r, insideRoundR, 0, Math.PI * 2)
ctx.fillStyle = "yellow"
ctx.fill()

ctx.beginPath()
ctx.arc(r, r, insideRoundR - insideRoundPad, 0, Math.PI * 2)
ctx.fillStyle = "black"
ctx.fill()
